data.fullContent: The fire downtown was all over the news today. It started early in the morning, and burned for four hours. You could see the smoke from three miles away. Three homes and two businesses were lost, and several more were damaged. But fortunately, nobody was badly hurt.
data.answer: 今天所有的新闻都在报道闹市区的火灾。它一大早就开始燃烧，燃烧了四个小时。你从三英里外就能看到烟。三所房屋和两家企业被毁，还有几处遭到破坏。但幸运的是，没有人受重伤。
